properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY ADMIN_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY ADMIN_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TB_ADMIN ( ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD ) VALUES ( SEQ_ADMINNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ?
SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_ADMIN SET ADMIN_ID = ? , ADMIN_PWD = ? , ADMIN_NAME = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ADMIN_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_ADMIN SET STATUS = 'N' , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ADMIN_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION WHERE PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
properties.etnry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RECOMMEND WHERE RECOMMEND_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
properties.entry: SELECT PLAN_NO , PLAN_TTILE FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION WHERE PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COMMUNITY_NO , COMMUNITY_TITLE FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
properties.etnry: SELECT RECOMMEND_NO , RECOMMEND_TITLE FROM TB_RECOMMEND WHERE RECOMMEND_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
